languages.text: "Мы верим в это всей душой! Новатор провела множество циклов на мире, где родилось дитя. Говорят, все, кто узрел чудо ее рождения, единовременно отбыли по приказу {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатора{/g} в одном ей известном направлении. А вскоре отбыла и сама Тисифона, оставив Кассии свой бесценный дар — Атлас — таким образом выбрав преемницу".

traits.locale_text: "Мы верим в это всей душой! Новатор провела множество циклов на мире, где родилось дитя. Говорят, все, кто узрел чудо ее рождения, единовременно отбыли по приказу {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатора{/g} в одном ей известном направлении. А вскоре отбыла и сама Тисифона, оставив Кассии свой бесценный дар — Атлас — таким образом выбрав преемницу".

languages.text: "We believe it with all our heart! The Novator spent many cycles on the world where the child was born. It is said that everyone who witnessed the miracle of her birth simultaneously departed for a destination known only to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. Tisiphone gave the order and followed them soon after, leaving her precious gift, the Atlas, to Cassia and therefore marking her as her successor."
languages.original_text: "Мы верим в это всей душой! Новатор провела множество циклов на мире, где родилось дитя. Говорят, все, кто узрел чудо ее рождения, единовременно отбыли по приказу {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатора{/g} в одном ей известном направлении. А вскоре отбыла и сама Тисифона, оставив Кассии свой бесценный дар — Атлас — таким образом выбрав преемницу".

traits.locale_text: "We believe it with all our hearts! The novator spent many cycles on the world where the child was born. They say everybody who witnessed the miracle of her birth simultaneously departed in an unknown direction following the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}novator's {/g}orders. Tisiphone herself followed them soon, leaving her precious gift, the Atlas, to Cassia and therefore marking her successor."

"We believe it with all our hearts! The novator spent many cycles on the world where the child was born. They say everybody who witnessed the miracle of her birth simultaneously departed in an unknown direction following the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}novator's {/g}orders. Tisiphone herself followed them soon, leaving her precious gift, the Atlas, to Cassia and therefore marking her successor."

"We believe it with all our heart! The Novator spent many cycles on the world where the child was born. It is said that everyone who witnessed the miracle of her birth simultaneously departed for a destination known only to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. Tisiphone gave the order and followed them soon after, leaving her precious gift, the Atlas, to Cassia and therefore marking her as her successor."

"We believe it with all our heart! The Novator spent many cycles on the world where the child was born. It is said that everyone who witnessed the miracle of her birth simultaneously departed for a destination known only to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. Tisiphone gave the order and followed them soon after, leaving her precious gift, the Atlas, to Cassia and therefore marking her as her successor."

"We believe it with all our heart! The Novator spent many cycles on the world where the child was born. It is said that everyone who witnessed the miracle of her birth simultaneously departed for a destination known only to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. Tisiphone gave the order and followed them soon after, leaving her precious gift, the Atlas, to Cassia and therefore marking her as her successor."

languages.text: “我们全心全意地相信这一点！大族长曾在那孩子诞生的世界中居住过许多个周期。据说，所有见证了那孩子诞生奇迹的人，都同时离开了，去了只有{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}知道的目的地。提西福涅下了命令，很快也和那些人一起走了。临走之前，她把她贵重的礼物群星圣仪留给了卡西娅。这代表她选定了卡西娅作为她的继承人。”
languages.original_text: "We believe it with all our heart! The Novator spent many cycles on the world where the child was born. It is said that everyone who witnessed the miracle of her birth simultaneously departed for a destination known only to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. Tisiphone gave the order and followed them soon after, leaving her precious gift, the Atlas, to Cassia and therefore marking her as her successor."

traits.locale_text: “我们全心全意地相信这一点！大族长曾在那孩子诞生的世界中居住过许多个周期。据说，所有见证了那孩子诞生奇迹的人，都同时离开了，去了只有{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}知道的目的地。提西福涅下了命令，很快也和那些人一起走了。临走之前，她把她贵重的礼物群星圣仪留给了卡西娅。这代表她选定了卡西娅作为她的继承人。”

languages.text: «¡Lo creemos de todo corazón! La Novator pasó muchos ciclos en el mundo donde nació la niña. Dicen que todos los que presenciaron el milagro de su nacimiento partieron simultáneamente hacia un destino que solo la {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} conocía. La propia Tisiphone dio la orden y les siguió poco después, dejando su valioso regalo, el Atlas, a Cassia y nombrándola por lo tanto su sucesora».
languages.original_text: "We believe it with all our heart! The Novator spent many cycles on the world where the child was born. It is said that everyone who witnessed the miracle of her birth simultaneously departed for a destination known only to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. Tisiphone gave the order and followed them soon after, leaving her precious gift, the Atlas, to Cassia and therefore marking her as her successor."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lo creemos de todo corazón! La Novator pasó muchos ciclos en el mundo donde nació la niña. Dicen que todos los que presenciaron el milagro de su nacimiento partieron simultáneamente hacia un destino que solo la {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} conocía. La propia Tisiphone dio la orden y les siguió poco después, dejando su valioso regalo, el Atlas, a Cassia y nombrándola por lo tanto su sucesora».

languages.text: 「我々は心からそう信じている！ノベイターは子供が生まれた世界で何サイクルも過ごした。その誕生の奇跡を目の当たりにした誰もが、同時に{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}だけが知る目的地へと旅立ったと言われている。ティシフォンは、カシアに大切な贈り物であるアトラスを託し、彼女を後継者と示したのだ」
languages.original_text: "We believe it with all our heart! The Novator spent many cycles on the world where the child was born. It is said that everyone who witnessed the miracle of her birth simultaneously departed for a destination known only to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. Tisiphone gave the order and followed them soon after, leaving her precious gift, the Atlas, to Cassia and therefore marking her as her successor."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は心からそう信じている！ノベイターは子供が生まれた世界で何サイクルも過ごした。その誕生の奇跡を目の当たりにした誰もが、同時に{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}だけが知る目的地へと旅立ったと言われている。ティシフォンは、カシアに大切な贈り物であるアトラスを託し、彼女を後継者と示したのだ」

languages.text: "Das glauben wir von ganzem Herzen! Die Novatorin hat viele Zyklen auf der Welt verbracht, auf der das Kind geboren wurde. Es heißt, dass alle Zeugen des Wunders ihrer Geburt gleichzeitig zu einem Ziel aufgebrochen sind, dass nur die {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorin{/g} kannte. Der Befehl kam von Tisiphone, und sie reiste kurz darauf hinterher. Den Atlas, ihr wertvollstes Geschenk, hinterließ sie Cassia und erklärte sie damit zu ihrer Nachfolgerin."
languages.original_text: "We believe it with all our heart! The Novator spent many cycles on the world where the child was born. It is said that everyone who witnessed the miracle of her birth simultaneously departed for a destination known only to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. Tisiphone gave the order and followed them soon after, leaving her precious gift, the Atlas, to Cassia and therefore marking her as her successor."

traits.locale_text: "Das glauben wir von ganzem Herzen! Die Novatorin hat viele Zyklen auf der Welt verbracht, auf der das Kind geboren wurde. Es heißt, dass alle Zeugen des Wunders ihrer Geburt gleichzeitig zu einem Ziel aufgebrochen sind, dass nur die {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorin{/g} kannte. Der Befehl kam von Tisiphone, und sie reiste kurz darauf hinterher. Den Atlas, ihr wertvollstes Geschenk, hinterließ sie Cassia und erklärte sie damit zu ihrer Nachfolgerin."

languages.text: « Nous en sommes sincèrement persuadés ! La {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} a passé bien des cycles sur le monde d'origine de l'Enfant. On raconte que sur son ordre, tous ceux qui ont assisté au miracle de sa naissance sont partis pour une destination inconnue. Peu après cette décision, Tisiphone a pris le même chemin, après avoir fait don de son cadeau le plus précieux, l'Atlas, à Cassia. Ainsi l'a-t-elle désignée comme sa successeure. »
languages.original_text: "We believe it with all our heart! The Novator spent many cycles on the world where the child was born. It is said that everyone who witnessed the miracle of her birth simultaneously departed for a destination known only to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. Tisiphone gave the order and followed them soon after, leaving her precious gift, the Atlas, to Cassia and therefore marking her as her successor."

traits.locale_text: « Nous en sommes sincèrement persuadés ! La {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} a passé bien des cycles sur le monde d'origine de l'enfant. On raconte que sur son ordre, tous ceux qui ont assisté au miracle de sa naissance sont partis pour une destination inconnue. Peu après cette décision, Tisiphone a pris le même chemin, après avoir fait don de son cadeau le plus précieux, l'Atlas, à Cassia. Ainsi l'a-t-elle désignée comme sa successeure. »

languages.text: "Buna tüm kalbimizle inanıyoruz! Rota Reisi, çocuğun doğduğu dünyada sayısız döngü geçirdi. Çocuğun doğumuna şahit olan herkesin aynı anda yalnızca {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisi'nin{/g} bildiği bir lokasyona taşındığı söylenir. Tisiphone emri verdikten kısa süre sonra onları takip edip çok değerli armağanı Atlas'ı ise Cassia'ya emanet etmiş, dolayısıyla da onu vârisi ilan etmiştir."
languages.original_text: "We believe it with all our heart! The Novator spent many cycles on the world where the child was born. It is said that everyone who witnessed the miracle of her birth simultaneously departed for a destination known only to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. Tisiphone gave the order and followed them soon after, leaving her precious gift, the Atlas, to Cassia and therefore marking her as her successor."

traits.locale_text: "Buna tüm kalbimizle inanıyoruz! Rota Reisi, çocuğun doğduğu dünyada sayısız döngü geçirdi. Çocuğun doğumuna şahit olan herkesin aynı anda yalnızca {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisi{/g}'nin bildiği bir lokasyona taşındığı söylenir. Tisiphone emri verdikten kısa süre sonra onları takip etmiş, o çok değerli armağanını, Atlas'ı ise Cassia'ya emanet etmiş, dolayısıyla da onu vârisi ilan etmiştir."
